title: 5v5 Ranked Team LFM
body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team got a Daily Playtime Shedule so pls be rly active.
-Playtime is from 20oCLock CET for atleast 2 Games.
-Be able to hold our shedule atleast 4 times a week.
-Iam looking for  Jungle and ADc aswell as some Subs.
-Subs always got the chance to earn a Mainspot.
-We will use Skype/TS for communication.
-be atleast 18years old
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for
-I will play some Normals with u to see how u behave in different situatuions and get used to your championpool.
-Tryouts till Friday.




if ur interrested apply here and/or addme ingame for a chat.

Strawhatya :)

replies.body:
Hey there.
I am searching for a Ranked Team. 
PLaying since season 1, but started Ranked on Season 3.
Im in Gold right now. Have nearly every champs and runes and can play all positions good or less.
Communication is maybe a problem since its hard for me to understand talking english.
well, maybe i get used to it.
if u are interested, w/e me.
WasWotsch (EUW)
